title: After blizzard of Afghanistan lies, it’s tough to determine who was deceived
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
For four days this month, the Pentagon’s top generals and civilian bosses frantically shifted verbs, tenses and explanations like frenzied...
